snippet.title: State of the Kingdom 06-13-2022
snippet.description:
Welcome to DeFi Kingdoms, the #1 game on the Harmony blockchain. Now on Avalanche as well with our own DFK Chain!  DeFi Kingdoms is a nostalgic pixel art game that combines a DEX, a liquidity pooling opportunity, and a market of rare, utility-driven NFT Heroes. Join us in-game and start playing to earn, or come and be a part of the community on our Discord server or the social media platform of your choice!

Learn more about the DFK Chain & Avalanche Subnet here on our Medium! https://medium.com/p/2d51333b1e4e

Website: https://defikingdoms.com
Discord: http://discord.gg/defikingdoms
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DefiKingdoms
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DefiKingdoms
Telegram: http://t.me/defikingdoms
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/defikingdoms
